text: Rita Tushingham (born 14 March 1942) is an English actress. She was born in Liverpool. She is known for her starring roles in movies including A Taste of Honey (1961), The Leather Boys (1964), The Knack â€¦and How to Get It (1965), Doctor Zhivago (1965), and Smashing Time (1967). She has won a BAFTA Award and a Golden Globe Award. ==References== Category:BAFTA Award winning actors Category:Golden Globe Award winning actors Category:1942 births Category:Living people Category:English movie actors Category:English television actors Category:English stage actors Category:Actors from Liverpool
title: Rita Tushingham
